name: Druddigon
author: match
flavor_text: It races through narrow caves, using its sharp claws to catch prey. The skin on its face is harder than a rock.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent’s attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
